snippet: Eva Rausing’s death appears to be the sorry denouement of years of struggle in which she and her husband, Hans, apparently never managed to shake their addictions.
abstract: Philanthropist Eva Rausing’s death appears to be the sorry denouement of years of struggle in which she and her husband, Hans, apparently never managed to shake their drug addictions; her body was found in their London town house, soon after her husband was caught driving erratically and arrested on suspicion of possessing drugs.
lead_paragraph: Eva Rausing’s death appears to be the sorry denouement of years of struggle in which she and her husband, Hans, apparently never managed to shake their addictions.

headline.seo: Philanthropist Couple’s Drug Downfall Ends in Death and Arrest
headline.main: Philanthropist Couple’s Drug Downfall Ends in Death and Arrest
headline.print_headline: Philanthropist Couple’s Drug Downfall Ends in Death and Arrest
